Corkscrew as a wine bottle opener: Use the corkscrew to remove the foil seal from wine bottles before using a traditional corkscrew to remove the cork.
Corkscrew as a bottle opener: The sharp end of the corkscrew can be used to open beer bottles by inserting it into the bottle cap and twisting it until the cap is removed.
Corkscrew as a nail cleaner: Dip the sharp end of the corkscrew into nail polish remover and use it to clean under the nails, removing dirt and polish.
Corkscrew as a small tool for fixing things: The corkscrew can be used to pick up small screws or other small items that are too small for your fingers.
Corkscrew as a toothpick holder: Attach a small cup to the corkscrew and use it to hold toothpicks, keeping them clean and organized.
